text: Nick of Time is a 1995 American action thriller movie directed by John Badham and starring Johnny Depp, Christopher Walken, Charles S. Dutton, Marsha Mason, Peter Strauss, Edith Diaz, Gloria Reuben. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 crime thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies set in hotels Category:Movies about kidnappings Category:Movies about assassinations Category:Movies directed by John Badham Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Nick of Time (movie)
